DOC.HEADLINE: ARKANSAS PUTS TWO MURDERERS TO DEATH
DOC.TEXT: A drifter convicted of killing a woman who fed him milk and cookies was executed Wednesday , as was a man who ignored a plea for mercy during an armed robbery . Jonas Whitmore was pronounced dead at 8:08 p.m. , a prison spokesman said . Edward Charles Pickens died from a lethal injection exactly an hour later . It was the first time a state executed two people on the same day since the U.S. Supreme Court allowed states to restore the death_penalty in 1976 .
